solution_line_template: Gabriela's grove produced {gabriela_oranges_per_tree} oranges/tree * {num_trees_per_grove} trees = <<{gabriela_oranges_per_tree}*{num_trees_per_grove}={gabriela_total_oranges}>>{gabriela_total_oranges} oranges
Alba's grove produced {alba_oranges_per_tree} oranges/tree * {num_trees_per_grove} trees = <<{alba_oranges_per_tree}*{num_trees_per_grove}={alba_total_oranges}>>{alba_total_oranges} oranges

Maricela's trees produced {maricela_oranges_per_tree} oranges/tree * {num_trees_per_grove} trees= <<{maricela_oranges_per_tree}*{num_trees_per_grove}={maricela_total_oranges}>>{maricela_total_oranges} oranges.

The Morales sisters therefore harvested a total of {gabriela_total_oranges} oranges + {alba_total_oranges} oranges + {maricela_total_oranges} oranges = <<{gabriela_total_oranges}+{alba_total_oranges}+{maricela_total_oranges}={total_oranges_harvested}>>{total_oranges_harvested} oranges

The oranges will therefore yield {total_oranges_harvested} oranges/{oranges_per_cup} oranges/cup = <<{total_oranges_harvested}/{oranges_per_cup}={total_cups_of_juice}>>{total_cups_of_juice} cups of juice
